doc.title: John Hooper reports that Italy's constitutional court has ditched Berlusconi's immunity
doc.author: Guardian staff reporter
doc.description: John Hooper reports that Italy's constitutional court has ditched Berlusconi's legal immunity

main.p: This article is more than 15 years old'Berlusconi is already weakened by the sex scandal'This article is more than 15 years old00:00:0000:00:00John Hooper reports that Italy's constitutional court has ditched Berlusconi's legal immunityExplore more on these topicsSilvio BerlusconiItaly
